scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:api && npm run lint:fix:web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:api && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
